title.narrative: Agriculture Project

description.narrative: Burkina Faso - Agriculture Project: This project aims to expand the productive use of land in order to increase the volume and value of agricultural production in project zones. The project consists of the following mutually reinforcing activities: water management and irrigation; diversified agriculture; and access to rural finance.

title.narrative: Access to Rural Finance
Diversified Agriculture and Water Management
Improving Agriculture Through Irrigation in Burkina Faso
Improving irrigation and land tenure in Burkina Faso
Measuring Results of the Burkina Faso Access to Rural Finance Activity

condition.narrative: Further details on conditions precedent affecting this activity can be found in the top-level parent activities.

Prior to the initial Disbursement of Program Funding for construction or physical works on the Di irrigation scheme, the Government shall have delivered satisfactory evidence that AMVS has adopted and will implement an AMVS Action Plan in form and substance satisfactory to MCC and based upon the recommendations of the AMVS Management Audit, as evidenced by an official instrument of the Ministry of Agriculture enclosing the AMVS Action Plan and the annual budget of the AMVS indicating sufficient funding for the implementation of the AMVS Action Plan.
